mods.abstract: Image of a group of students outdoors, dressed in "Winters Orientation Leader" t-shirts. They appear to be playing a game where a few of them stand in a circle around others who are trying to get out. Other people can be seen in the background, observing the group.
mods.note: "I-6" is written on the back of the photograph. Also in sleeve: a slip of lined paper which says "Stacey Barry," "Nicole Revoy."
mods.accessCondition: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Available by request for research purposes only. All other uses must be cleared by patron through copyright holders. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca
